Unfamiliarity with the industry or market, leading to difficulty in identifying target customers and pricing strategies.
Competition from established businesses in the same industry, making it difficult to gain market share.
Difficulty in attracting and retaining customers, due to lack of brand recognition or poor customer service.
Hiring and managing a team, including finding and training employees with the necessary skills and experience.
Difficulty in managing cash flow and maintaining a positive balance sheet, due to high startup costs and slow revenue growth.
